item.title: MySQL Binary Log
item.description: MySQL Binary Log is often used to append watchers on the table changes. I used it to react on new insert on the separate service (it can be also achieved using event pattern) Storage One of drawback is storage.

item.title: Cancel pending axios request before making new to the same url
item.description: VueJS Simple vueJS hook to handle request cancelation when new config was provided import axios, { AxiosRequestConfig, AxiosResponse } from 'axios'; import { ref } from ...

item.title: Random notes related to PineScript
item.description: var keyword use var keyword to define veriable accessed in all bars. Access previus data use index to access previous data, for example close[1] to get previous close.

item.title: CNNs are excellent for image recognition tasks and can be trained to detect patterns in chart images.
item.description: CNNs are excellent for image recognition tasks and can be trained to detect patterns in chart images. Github repository Create CNN with Python Advices and plan to create automated trading.

item.title: Strategy which use Chandelier Exit
item.description: This indicator connections (adding ema-trend-meter) can imporve the signals. ema-trend-meter they should be all in the same colors for 2 timeframe and signal from the chandelier-exit should apper, then enter the posioton.

item.title: Use of PineScript from TradingView
item.description: Great fast YT tutorial create plots, strategies, backtesitng Alternatives This articel include alternatives to PineScript.

item.title: Strategy which use AI indicator and zones
item.description: Add supply and demand zones on the chart. Use indicator for it and also add myself using simple lines .

item.title: Tool for me as a developer
item.description: Here is a list of dev tools which can i use to develop tools which help me during trading. JavaScript library for indicators Python library to idnetify chart pattern.
